title: Data Export Requested
description: Fired when a user requests an export of their personal data.

requestId.description: Unique identifier for the data export request.

userId.description: Unique identifier for the user requesting the export.

dataTypes.description: List of data types included in the export (e.g. profile, activity, purchases).

format.description: The file format for the exported data.

regulation.description: The privacy regulation under which the export was requested.
